text: Anata wa, hitobito no naka shinkō suru mono o tekishi suru koto ga mottomo kibishī no wa, yudayahito to tashinkyō todearu koto o shirudearou. Mata anata wa, shinkō suru mono ni ichiban shin'ai no jō o daite iru no wa,`watashi-tachi wa kirisutokyōtodesu.' To iu monodearu koto o shirudearou. Kore wa kare-ra no ma ni, shisai to shūdō-shi ga ite, kare-ra ga kōmandenai tamedearu
